LanguageData.VWE_Gun_RocketLauncher.label: rocket launcher
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_RocketLauncher.description: A single-use rocket launcher firing a massive, high-explosive warhead. Slow to aim with a significant minimum range due to its power, it excels against structures, mechanoids, and armored foes. Its unwieldiness, single-use nature, and sheer destruction make it a rare and scary sight in combat.
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_RocketLauncher.tools.0.label: barrel
LanguageData.VWE_Bullet_Rocket.label: rocket
